It can be a really fun game of hide and seek, whether you're doing the hiding or the seeking. 

My one issue with this game is the community, people can be real assholes, tea bagging and salty post game chat being the stand out examples. If that isn't something you're bothered by, and the games basic premises sounds fun, you'll probably enjoy the game a lot.

Some game mechanics are broken and just don't work as they should. Some killers and their addons/perks combo's are just annoying and disturbing; more than 60% of ranks 1-8 are just toxic kids who plays bubba or other killers who can one-shot you while face-camping or teabagging. Many survivors at top ranks (1-5) straight up teabagging toxic players who will try to juke you and then cry after you hook them cuz you "tunnel" them

What am I thinking about Dead By Daylight ? 
In my opinion dead by daylight is a good game so far, one thing is, that is easy to get angry by playing killer. 

Killers:
Trapper - 50/50 - not playing
Wraith - good killer - often playing
Hillbilly - great killer - playing rarely
Nurse - <33333
Shape - great killer - playing rarely 
Hag - i don't like this killer - not playing
Doctor - I don't like this killer - not playing
Huntress - <333333

Nightmare - rarely playing 
Pig - like this killer - rarely plaing 
Clown - <33333
Spirit - like this killer - not often playing 
Legion - <3 
Plague - like this killer
Ghost Face - i don't have opinion about this killer
Demogorgon - like this killer
Oni - don't like
